mapper.select: SELECT id, title, current_num AS currentNum, max_num AS maxNum, performance_date AS performanceDate, reg_date AS regDate, poster_file AS posterFile, content FROM performance ORDER BY performance_date DESC
SELECT id, title, current_num AS currentNum, max_num AS maxNum, performance_date AS performanceDate, reg_date AS regDate, poster_file AS posterFile, content FROM performance WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, title, current_num AS currentNum, max_num AS maxNum, performance_date AS performanceDate, reg_date AS regDate, poster_file AS posterFile, content FROM performance WHERE title = #{title} AND performance_date = #{performanceDate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO performance ( title, current_num, max_num, performance_date, poster_file, content ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{currentNum}, #{maxNum}, #{performanceDate}, #{posterFile}, #{content} )
mapper.update: UPDATE performance SET title = #{title}, current_num = #{currentNum}, max_num = #{maxNum}, performance_date = #{performanceDate}, poster_file = #{posterFile}, content = #{content} WHERE id = #{id}
